verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Speak|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Israel, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w take|strong="H7311"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* every \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* rod \w by|strong="H0413"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* kindreds, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* all \w the|strong="H0853"\w* princes \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* tribes, twelve rods, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* write \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w name|strong="H0559"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* every \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w upon|strong="H0784"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* rod.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* name \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* tribe \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Levi, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* rod \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* contain all \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w families|strong="H1121"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3548"\w* thou shalt lay \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w up|strong="H0853"\w* \w in|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* tabernacle \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* covenant before \w the|strong="H0853"\w* testimony, \w where|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* speak \w to|strong="H7126"\w* thee.

Whomsoever \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w these|strong="H1931"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* choose, \w his|strong="H3068"\w* rod \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* blossom: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* cease \w from|strong="H0376"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* murmurings \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, wherewith \w they|strong="H0834"\w* murmur \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w spoke|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* princes \w gave|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* rods \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* tribe: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* twelve rods \w besides|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rod \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* laid \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w up|strong="H7200"\w* \w before|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* testimony:

\w He|strong="H0935"\w* \w returned|strong="H0935"\w* \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* following \w day|strong="H4872"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* found \w that|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* rod \w of|strong="H0168"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* house \w of|strong="H0168"\w* Levi, \w was|strong="H4872"\w* budded: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w that|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* buds swelling \w it|strong="H6440"\w* \w had|strong="H4872"\w* bloomed blossoms, \w which|strong="H4150"\w* spreading \w the|strong="H6440"\w* leaves, \w were|strong="H6440"\w* formed \w into|strong="H0413"\w* almonds.

\w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w therefore|strong="H4872"\w* brought \w out|strong="H0413"\w* all \w the|strong="H0559"\w* rods \w from|strong="H0413"\w* \w before|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* all \w the|strong="H0559"\w* children \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Israel: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* saw, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* every \w one|strong="H3068"\w* received \w their|strong="H3068"\w* rods.

\w And|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord said \w to|strong="H5921"\w* Moses: Carry back \w the|strong="H0853"\w* rod \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Aaron \w into|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* tabernacle \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* testimony, \w that|strong="H5307"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w may|strong="H5307"\w* \w be|strong="H5712"\w* kept \w there|strong="H8432"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* token \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* rebellious children \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Israel, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H5307"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* complaints \w may|strong="H5307"\w* cease \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* lest \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w die|strong="H5307"\w*.
\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* did \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* children \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H5971"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* consumed, \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w all|strong="H2009"\w* perish.

Whosoever approacheth \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H0996"\w* tabernacle \w of|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H0996"\w* Lord, he dieth. \w Are|strong="H5975"\w* \w we|strong="H4191"\w* all \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w a|strong="H5975"\w* \w man|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* utterly destroyed?
